version_description:
• Photo Match.
• Starter Pack added.
• Skill Set Menu Revamp
- 15 new Skills, 3 new Stances.
- 6 Skills removed.
- Skill Training Time decreased.
- Skill Points Reset for free.
• Improved Star Point Rules.
• Improved Replay for Matches when User is away.
• Optimized Gameplay for Early Stages.
• Improved Icon Images for each League.
• Various bugs fixed.

Patch Fix
• The issue with Auto Play in League and Story Mode after using Photo Match has been fixed.
• Matchups based on the New Star Point Rules have been adjusted for better balance (adjustments being made currently).
• Issues with uploading photos for Photo Match has been fixed.

Patch Fix
• Minor Bugs Fixed.

• Along with the release of new Shop Products there is an updated Shop interface for improved usage.
• Improved access to Sponsor Menu and contents.
• Can no longer select an opponent in League Mode when there is insufficient Coins to search.
• Location of the FEEDBACK and HELP&SUPPORT buttons changed for better access to users.
• Probability adjusted to have RARE class of Gear appear more often than COMMON class in League Reward Packages/Boxes.
• Upgrade point value has been decreased when Upgrading higher class Gear with lower class Gear.
• Adjustment made to the amount of Coins acquired in League Reward Packages/Boxes and the amount of Coins that can be purchased.
• Reduced prices for Rotation Stock Parts.
• Slight increase in Stock Parts needed when Grading Up to UNIQUE class of Gear.
• Adjustment in default Inventory count for new users and price for expanding Inventory for all users.
• Various bugs have been fixed and improved.

• Limited Offer spelling error fixed.
• Bug not showing Stunned effect now fixed.

• Long-awaited League 8 now open.
• 3 New EPIC Class MegaPunch Gloves and 1 EPIC-EXCLUSIVE MegaPunch Gloves can be opened in League 8 Reward Packages/Boxes.
• Can renew contract with trainer to earn Skill Points in League 8.
• Can Grade Up EPIC Class Gloves to LEGENDARY Class.
• Stock Parts for Grading Up EPIC Class Gloves can be found in Rotation Shop and also in 8 hour League 8 Reward Boxes.
• New Achievements added for League 8.
• New Limited Items Added
• New Achievements added for League 8.
• Glove Stock Parts Pack 4 (Available when EPIC Gloves are at max level and while in League 8./Offer available for 3 days, available again for purchase after 7 days)
• Special Brand Box Set (Character must be at least Level 8 to purchase./Offer available for 7 days)
• EPIC MegaPunch Box (Can only be purchased while in League 8./ Offer available for 3 days, available again for purchase after 7 days)
• Adjustment to Training Cost
• Training Price Increased.
• AI Difficulty Level Modified
• For Defense Matches, improvement made to the delay caused by the high frequency of decision making by the AI.

V1.1.0
• New Omega Fusion Gear
• Clan System Added
• News Ticker
• New Soundtrack
• Advertisements
• View Rate of Gear Acquisition
• Adjustment to AI
• New SWANK
• World Rank #1 Leader Board
• New Shop Products
• 6 New Languages
• Usernames All Lang.
• Search Cost Change
• Energy Bar Price Change
• Gift for All Users
• Various Bugs Fixed

Boxing Star's Long-Awaited Grand Launch!

The #1 Mobile Boxing Game is Going Global!
Brand New Exciting Features and Updates for Old and New Users Alike!
Download and Truly Become the #1 Fighter in the World!

Patch 1.1.1
Bugs Fixed
• Device language setting issue resolved.
• Cost to create Clan adjusted to 1000 Coins.
• Spelling errors corrected.
• Bug with Grading Up while not fulfilling requirements (causing negative Stock Parts) fixed.

Bugs Fixed
- Improvement to game restart when download resource check fails.
- Problem with displaying English when devices in Simplified/Traditional Chinese solved.

Exciting New Features and Items!
• Modify Feature to change a Gear’s Options now available.
• In the Modify Menu, You can replace a selected Gear’s Options with the Option you want.
• An OptionMod is required to change Options.
• An OptionMod can be obtained by disassembling Gear that has Options above a specific Option Grade.
• New Glove Gear Options Added
• Mega Weave Hyper - Hyper Gauge goes up after successfully Weaving Foe's MegaPunch.
• Jab Skill % - Increases probability of using Equipped Jab Skills.
• Hook Skill % - Increases probability of using Equipped Hook Skills.
• Uppercut Skill % - Increases probability of using Equipped Uppercut Skills.
• Weave Breaker Jab - Jab Power increases when Foe is Weaving.
• New Glove Gear Options Added
• HP Up during Clinch - When Clinch is successful, HP will recover slowly until Clinch is broken.
• Hook Guard Defense Up - Increases Hook Defense during Guard.
• Costume Box with New Costumes added to Willy’s Shop
• When you receive a Costume you already own, you will receive a Gift Receipt.
• Can purchase Costumes using the Gift Receipts.
• The following Reward Items have been added to Level 4 and 5 Clan Swap Boxes:
• Gear OptionMods
• Costume Gift Receipts
• Option to select all of a particular Grade of Gear in the Upgrading, Selling, Donating, or Dismantling Menus Added.
• Clan Hall of Fame tab is temporarily closed in order to add a new interesting feature.

Balance Adjustment
• Star Point deduction protection for beginner users has been adjusted.
• Star Points 0 - 300 -> 0 – 800.
• Trinity U333’s MegaPunch Power and Speed increased.
• Reaching Stun Warning Status with Jabs made more difficult.
• Extra damage for Stamina Burner Skills removed when hitting a Stunned opponent.
• When under 20% Stamina, Reflex is also negatively affected.
• Improvements made to AI that control fighters when users are away.

Bugs Fixed
• Recommended Friends back online.
• Various Bugs Fixed.

• New Group Match Feature Added
• New Staff Feature Added
• New Product’s Available in Willy’s Shop
• Luxury Box acquisition rates adjusted
• More Star Points can be earned in lower Leagues
• Change in Clan Rules
• FIGHT text image at the beginning of a Match changed to be less distracting by having it disappear faster.
• Issue with game freezing after watching ads has been fixed
• Various bugs fixed

v 1.3.1
Fixed bugs
•Fixed a bug where Shock skill was unable to unleash normally.
•Fixed a problem where cetain in-game TEXT was not applied to multiple languages correctly.
•Improved an issue that players get disconnected frequently due to unstable network.
•Improved an issue where the screen displayed abnormally when entering to Sponsor

v 1.3.0
• New Group Match Feature Added
• New Staff Feature Added
• New Product’s Available in Willy’s Shop
• Luxury Box acquisition rates adjusted
• More Star Points can be earned in lower Leagues
• Change in Clan Rules
• FIGHT text image at the beginning of a Match changed to be less distracting by having it disappear faster.
• Issue with game freezing after watching ads has been fixed
• Various bugs fixed

Bug Fix
• Fixed a bug where the in-game shop’s background color was changed to black

New Update News!
• League 9 Open!
• New Story Mode Chapters. New Costumes to Unlock.
• Increased Max Levels and New Attack Skills Added.
• New Season Omega Box Added.
• Improvements and additions to Sponsorship system.
• New Items Added to Willy’s Shop.
• New Mandatory Defense Match, win Match and earn a New Reward Box.
• Balance Adjustments for Improved Gameplay.
• Various Bugs and Errors Fixed.

• 2 Skill Points Earned text error fixed
• Luxury Bag typo fixed
• Invalidation Skill appearing when the Uppercut Skill Armor was activated bug fixed
• Missing Gear Option Translations fixed
• Elegance Protector typo fixed

Various Bugs Fixed
• Chimera MegaPunch duration bug fixed.
• Typo in Omega Fusion tool tip fixed.
• Skill Tree Menu fixed.
• AI not moving fixed.
• Loading tips added before Story Mode.
• Issue with photos in Photo Match fixed.
• Issue with exiting Replays fixed.
• Issues caused by viewing ad fixed. (Including Promoter Matches)
• Issue with Tutorial fixed.
• Issue with screen being cut in half fixed.
• Issue with wrong profile picture in Defense Matches fixed.
• Issues with UI overlapping fixed.

•Tournament mode available
•Minor bugs fixed

Minor Bugs Fixed
• Issue fixed with Shop product prices occasionally not displaying correctly.
• Issue fixed with Shop product prices not displaying after closing a playing advertisement video.
• v1.7.0 Issues Fixed
• Minor Bug Fix: Gym Issues Fixed

Enjoy the Hellishly Amazing New Content!
• 3 Powerful MegaPunches Added
• New F14 Hellraiser WHEELS Added
• New Duke Hellentine Costume Added
• New Event System Added
• New Friend Invite Added
• Replay System Fixed
• When game is force closed after Match is finished and Ad is played, the correct amount of Star Points will be given/taken according to the Match result
• Issue of a finished match not going to the Match Result page fixed
• Various Bugs Fixed
Freezing Issue Fixed

• Gym (Character Development Content)
• MegaPunch Fast Forward Added
• Replay Report Added
• Clan Rewards and Event Costumes Added
• Additional Animation for Inferno MegaPunch
• Various Bugs Fixed
• Minor Bug Fix: Gym Issues Fixed

• New Knockout Mode Added
• League 10 Added
• New Hand of God Omega Fusion Gloves Added
• Option Modify Improvement
• Catalog to Select Gear Added
• Maximum Skill Level Training Raised
• #1 Ranked Player Achievement History Added
• Profile Icons and Selection Option Added
• New 1-Year Anniversary App Icon
• New 1-Year Anniversary Gloves Added
• 1-Year Anniversary Events
• Arabic Language Added
• v1.7.0 Issues Fixed
